title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of The Herd, Colin starts with his love of the selfless Golden State Warriors and their new cog in the machine, guard Jordan Poole. And after a social media response from the man himself, Colin needs to clarify a few things about Arizona Cardinal quarterback Kyler Murray. Colin likens the Jazz to one unique college football program. Finally, a rare and glorious appearance from NBA veteran and Golden State Warriors analyst Tom Tolbert, who weighs in on the ongoing outcomes of the Playoffs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
